languages.text:
Существо ослабевает в присутствии Кроноса.
−<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} ВЫН Кроноса)</u> к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальнему Бою{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

languages.text:

traits.locale_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU bonus)</u> to WS and BS.

The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

languages.text:
La criatura se debilita en presencia de Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES de Cronos)</u> a su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} y su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La criatura se debilita en presencia de Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por RES de Cronos)</u> a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}HA{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}HP{/g}.

languages.text:
此生物遭到了克罗诺斯的弱化。
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低，等同于<u>（10+5×克罗诺斯的坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
此生物在面对克罗诺斯时会变弱。
此生物的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}降低，等同于<u>（10+5×克罗诺斯的坚韧{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u> 。

languages.text: クロノスがいる場合、その生物は弱くなる。−<u>(10 + 5 × クロノスのTOU{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>が{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}射撃技能{/g}に与えられる。
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
クロノスがいる場合、その生物は弱くなる。
{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}が−<u>(10+5×クロノスのTOU{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>。

languages.text:
Ist Cronos anwesend, ist diese Kreatur geschwächt.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos-ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fertigkeit{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Ist Cronos anwesend, ist diese Kreatur geschwächt.
−<u>(10 + 5× Cronos-ZÄH-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WF{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BF{/g}.

languages.text:
La créature s'affaiblit en présence de Cronos.
Une pénalité de -<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de E de Cronos)</u> s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de Combat{/g} et à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Capacité de Tir{/g}.
languages.original_text:
The creature weakens in the presence of Cronos.
−<u>(10 + 5 × Cronos' TOU {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g})</u> to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
La créature s'affaiblit en présence de Cronos.
Une pénalité de -<u>(10 + 5 × {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de RES de Cronos)</u> s'applique à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}CA{/g} et à sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g}.
